import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import NavBar from "../NavBar/NavBar"; function HomePage() { return (

Welcome to My Web Project

A task to learn frontend and backend technologies

Technologies Used

This project was built to learn about both frontend and backend development. Here are the main technologies used:

Frontend

React is used for building the user interface. It's a powerful JavaScript library that allows creating dynamic, single-page applications with ease.

Backend

The backend is built with Node.js using the{" "} Express framework. This handles the API and server-side operations for the application.

Database

We are using SQLite for lightweight, serverless database management, which allows for easy storage and retrieval of data.

Full-text Search

Solr is used for implementing full-text search capabilities. It helps index and search large amounts of data efficiently.

Created as part of a learning task to master frontend and backend technologies.

); } export default HomePage;
